devdoc.details: See https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-721Note: The ERC-165 identifier for this interface is 0x8b8b4ef5.

batchBurnFrom(address,uint256[]).details: Reverts if the sender is not approved for any of `tokenIds`.Reverts if one of `tokenIds` is not owned by `from`.Emits an {IERC721-Transfer} event to address zero for each of `tokenIds`.

params.tokenIds: Identifiers of the tokens to burn.

burnFrom(address,uint256).details: Reverts if the sender is not approved.Reverts if `tokenId` is not owned by `from`.Emits an {IERC721-Transfer} event to address zero.

params.tokenId: Identifier of the token to burn.

devdoc.title: ERC721 Non-Fungible Token Standard, optional extension: Burnable.
